gobblin.writer

Interface WatermarkStorage


  • @Alpha
public interface WatermarkStorage
    Storage for Watermarks. Used in streaming execution.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void commitWatermarks(Iterable<CheckpointableWatermark> watermarks)
      Commit a batch of watermarks to storage.
      Map<String,CheckpointableWatermark> getCommittedWatermarks(Class<? extends CheckpointableWatermark> watermarkClass, Iterable<String> sourcePartitions)
      Retrieve previously committed watermarks.

    • Method Detail

      • commitWatermarks

        void commitWatermarks(Iterable<CheckpointableWatermark> watermarks)
               throws IOException
        Commit a batch of watermarks to storage.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getCommittedWatermarks

        Map<String,CheckpointableWatermark> getCommittedWatermarks(Class<? extends CheckpointableWatermark> watermarkClass,
                                                           Iterable<String> sourcePartitions)
                                                    throws IOException
        Retrieve previously committed watermarks.
        Parameters:
        watermarkClass: - the specific class that corresponds to the watermark expected
        sourcePartitions: - a list of source partitions for whom we're retrieving committed watermarks.
        Returns:
        a map of String -> CheckpointableWatermark. The key corresponds to the source field in the CheckpointableWatermark and belongs to the list of source partitions passed in.
        Throws:
        IOException
